name: timemachine-snapshot-manager
title: Time Machine Snapshot Manager
description: Reclaim disk space by bulk-deleting Time Machine local snapshots. macOS creates these when your backup disk is disconnected, silently eating 50-200GB+ on Macs with limited storage.
author: mattiacolombomc

commands.name: clean-snapshots
commands.title: Clean Time Machine Snapshots
commands.description: List and delete local Time Machine snapshots

preferences.name: concurrency
preferences.title: Parallel Deletion Threads
preferences.description: Number of snapshots to delete simultaneously. Higher = faster but more CPU usage.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
